sections: It's time to take another look at the Chevy Chevelles in our inventory.

inventory a few months ago, we had an overwhelming response. Since the collector car market is so hot right now, all of those cars have found new homes, so it seems like a good time to explore the current crop of

This 1 of 1 fully documented, registry listed Chevelle Super Sport SS454 LS6 made up gasp in admiration. This exceptional Chevelle is a fully documented, correctly restored coupe that wraps a numbers-matching LS6 in creamy Gobi Beige and Medium Saddle aesthetics. And if you're looking for some awesome metal that's unique, attractive and ready to roll, you simply won't find a cooler classic! One of only three registry-listed 1970 LS6 coupes painted Gobi Beige, and the only registry-listed Gobi Beige 1970 LS6 coupe fitted with a Medium Saddle interior, this show stopping Chevelle is 100% factory correct thanks to a detailed, ground-up restoration.

You probably stopped to look at this 1967 Chevrolet Chevelle Pro Touring because you know you've seen it somewhere before.  It's a true star car that has done everything, including SEMA, television shows, and the cover of Hot Rod (we even have a copy to prove it!) This is a full custom done by Year One and Brewer Restoration and Performance, and so that means the best parts went into the build.  Then, they decided to showcase this 500hp big block machine everywhere.  So dig into al the details on your opportunity to take home something that's sleek, unique, and absolutely a celebrity. A build like this gets planned out well in advance.

This 1970 Chevrolet Chevelle is eye-catching and is fully loaded with all of the features desired by all modern collectors.  Chevy's Chevelle underwent a major refresh in 1970, with bolder body lines and dual blending headlights.  Under the cowl induction hood on this Chevy muscle car is a Chevrolet 454 Cubic Inch Engine with single 4 barrel carburetor. This Chevelle has a truly sporty feel with a 4 Speed Manual Transmission mated to the Big Block motor.  Dual exhaust gives this Chevelle a throaty, muscle car sound.  This classic Chevy is loaded with options including Power Steering and Power Front Disc Brakes, which makes this Chevelle much more comfortable to drive.

Here we have a 1970 Chevrolet Chevelle Resto Mod for sale.  Consistently one of the most sought-after muscle cars ever built, the 70 Chevelle is highly regarded as to the Muscle Car that others are measured by.  This one will set the bar no matter where you pull in at!  It's a Frame Off Restoration that features all the iconic styling that makes these Chevelles so notorious.

A professional frame-off restoration back to factory specficiation went into this stunning Chevelle. It has a matching numbers car with correct CE 396/350hp big block V8,  that's backed by a  turbo 400 automatic transmission.

This frame off restored Chevelle has it all! How about a 620 hp crate motor, electric overdrive automatic, a kickin stereo, air conditioning, hydroboost steering and brakes with Wilwood 4 wheel disc. And if you didn't notice it's a lipstick red convertible.

Let's take a 1969 Chevelle and do a frame off restoration to it, and while performing the tasks that surround this process, add in some special touches, custom paint, a 5.3 Liter LS V8 with a tricky cam, and some extra creature comforts like a digital dash, A/C, and a custom interior.   We have a classic looker that can hold its own up against most of the competition out there, and certainly the interest of the Chevelle Aficionado.
